趞趞趞

趞字的基本解释

趞
què
行走轻捷的样子。

趞
qì
古同“趚”，侧行。

趞
jí
古同“踖”，践踏。

趞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］
［《廣韻》七雀切，入藥，清。］
(1)行走轻快敏捷的样子。
(2)书法学中指运笔轻盈而劲健。
[②]［qì］
［《集韻》七迹切，入，清。］
侧行。
[③]［jí］
［《集韻》秦昔切，入，從。］
同“踖1”。
践踏。

趞字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　趞； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1218第15
【廣韻】七雀切【集韻】七約切，?音鵲。【說文】趬趞也。一曰行貌。【博雅】趞趞，行也。　又【集韻】七迹切，音刺。與趚同。側行也。　又秦昔切，音籍。與踖同。踐也。

趞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
趞字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
què
The look of walking briskly.
Li
qì
The ancient same "Jian", walking sideways.
Li
jí
Gu Tong "stuck" and trampled.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［què］
["Guangyun" Qique cut, used as medicine, clear. ]
(1) The appearance of walking briskly.
(2) The middle finger of calligraphy is light and vigorous.
[②]［qì］
["Jiyun" seven traces cut, enter , clear. ]
Side row.
[③]［jí］
["Jiyun" Qin Xiqie, enter , follow. ]
Same as "踖1".
trample.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Zhou Zi Department] 　趞; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1218 No. 15
[Guang Yun] Qi Que cut [Ji Yun] Qi Yue cut,? Yin magpie. [Said the text] 趬趞also. One is the appearance. [Bo Ya] It's okay.　[Jiyun] Seven traces cut, sound sting. Same as Jian. Side line also.　Qin Xiqie again, music book. The same as 踖. Practice also.
